message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer gives us both a good deal.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, considering the time pressure and inflation working against you, Alice.
The inflation is working against me, Bob. I need a bit more than that to make it worthwhile.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option. Every round costs us money!
Bob, I need to factor in the inflation. This offer still gives you a decent chunk.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you more than half of what it's currently worth to you. Take the deal before it gets even worse for both of us!
Bob, this is my final offer. It's more than fair considering the circumstances.  If you reject it, we're both losing out.
